text: Bring the chicken to room temperature and pat dry with a paper towel
Mix 1 teaspoon of kosher salt to a bowl, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 spoon of onion powder, half teaspoon of ground black pepper in a bowl for dry rub
Sprinkle the mixture all over the chicken
Rub the mixture generously on the top of chicken
Cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes
